snippet.title: Wild Country Release Date Reveal - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Lost Native reveals the launch date for its cosy-competitive card game with city-building elements, exclusive to the Convergence Games Showcase. Collect cards, construct buildings, explore Big Sky, and challenge friends in this one-of-a-kind strategy game.

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1515000

#convergenceshow #indiegame
